unauthorized.description: 401 Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

response.errorMessage: Authentication failed. The API key is invalid or has expired.
errorDetails: Verify that the API key is correct and has not expired
Generate a new API key if necessary

notAcceptable.description: 406 Not Acceptable - API version not supported

response.errorMessage: The requested API version is not supported by this NetBackup server.
errorDetails: The Accept header specifies version 12.0, but this server only supports versions up to 11.0
Update the API version in your configuration or upgrade the NetBackup server

notFound.description: 404 Not Found - Resource does not exist

response.errorMessage: The requested resource was not found.
errorDetails: The storage unit 'disk-pool-99' does not exist
Verify the resource identifier and try again
Check the API documentation for valid parameter values
Ensure filter expressions follow OData standards

internalServerError.description: 500 Internal Server Error - Unexpected system error

response.errorMessage: An unexpected system error occurred while processing the request.
errorDetails: Check the NetBackup logs for more information

unsupportedMediaType.description: 415 Unsupported Media Type - Invalid Content-Type header

response.errorMessage: The media type specified in the Content-Type header is not supported.
You do not have permission to perform this operation.
errorDetails: Contact your NetBackup administrator to request access

serviceUnavailable.description: 503 Service Unavailable - NetBackup service is temporarily unavailable

response.errorMessage: The NetBackup service is temporarily unavailable.
errorDetails: The NetBackup master server is currently restarting
Please try again in a few minutes

rateLimitExceeded.description: 429 Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

response.errorMessage: Too many requests. Rate limit exceeded.
errorDetails: Please wait before making additional requests
